NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Need microphone access for using videos.
NSCameraUsageDescription: It is necessary for the user to recognize the QR code with the camera and provide the app's server information.
NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: User need permission to use and browse peripherals to communicate with the sensor.
NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: User need permission to use Bluetooth to communicate with the sensor.

action.sensor-select: Do you want to connect to that sensor?

qr.subscription: If you fit the QR code and barcode within the guide line, it will be automatically recognized.
qr.request-save-server: Change to the server of your choice?
qr.request-move-server: Go to the server selection screen?
qr.same-change-server: It is the same server as the current server.

error.permission-deny-camera: Camera access is denied and cannot be used.
error.name-date: Please enter your name and date of birth.
error.device: can not be ues if running in a simulator or emulator.
